video.title: Scrubs
video.synopsis: A young attending physician and his fellow doctors practice mischief and medicine while learning life lessons at the Sacred Heart teaching hospital.

episodes.synopsis: Four years of medical school has prepared J.D. for his first day as an intern at Sacred Heart Hospital -- but he still has doubts.
episodes.title: My First Day

episodes.synopsis: Sardonic Dr. Cox gets to J.D., who's in desperate need of acceptance; tactless Elliot irks Carla, who's being wooed by slick Turk.
episodes.title: My Mentor

episodes.synopsis: Professional and personal situations test the bounds of friendship between J.D. and Turk; a sexist matter entangles Elliot with Kelso.
episodes.title: My Best Friend's Mistake

episodes.synopsis: J.D.'s reflections on the past introduces speculation on the fates of three new patients.
episodes.title: My Old Lady

episodes.synopsis: J.D. points out what seems to be a technical mistake to Dr. Kelso, but it was really an attempt by Dr. Cox to save a woman without insurance.
episodes.title: My Two Dads

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Cox is dealing with a suspension, and J.D. is assigned to a special patient: Jordan Sullivan, an important board member.
episodes.title: My Bad

episodes.synopsis: J.D. has finally earned the spot as brightest student, but he's got competition: Nick Murdoch, who seems to be nicer and has a better butt than him.
episodes.title: My Super Ego

episodes.synopsis: J.D. and Turk become heroes after saving a cameraman's life on television while heading to a strip club.
episodes.title: My Fifteen Minutes

episodes.synopsis: J.D. gets to see the hospital through the eyes of a patient when he's admitted for appendicitis.
episodes.title: My Day Off

episodes.synopsis: J.D.'s relationship with Carla evolves as he begins to outdistance her medical knowledge.
episodes.title: My Nickname

episodes.synopsis: It's Christmas, and the gang is jaded until one of J.D.'s patients suddenly returns from a coma.
episodes.title: My Own Personal Jesus

episodes.synopsis: When a woman slips and falls on the wet floor of the hospital, Dr. Kelso asks J.D. to stand by her and be friendly so she won't sue them.
episodes.title: My Blind Date

episodes.synopsis: J.D. becomes frustrated when his budding romance with an ex-patient is constantly interrupted by emergency calls.
episodes.title: My Balancing Act

episodes.synopsis: J.D. chooses Alex over Elliot when the two argue over missing medication, based solely on his chances of "booty."
episodes.title: My Drug Buddy

episodes.synopsis: After going to bed and spending an entire day having sex, J.D. and Elliot go to work trying to hide their new secret romance.
episodes.title: My Bed Banter & Beyond

episodes.synopsis: When a rampaging Dr. Cox suddenly shows up at his door, J.D. sees a possibility of a breakthrough in their relationship.
episodes.title: My Heavy Meddle

episodes.synopsis: J.D., Elliot, and Turk receive their first medical students, and now they finally get a chance to see what it feels like to be on the other side.
episodes.title: My Student

episodes.synopsis: When J.D. has a patient who's rude to him and eventually dies from cancer, he feels awful for not giving the man his full attention.
episodes.title: My Tuscaloosa Heart

episodes.synopsis: An assortment of moms and dads descend on their offspring at home and in the workplace.
episodes.title: My Old Man

episodes.synopsis: Turk's competitiveness is starting to annoy J.D., especially when it crosses the line of personal jokes and potentially effects a patient's life.
episodes.title: My Way or the Highway

episodes.synopsis: J.D. fears being contaminated with Hepatitis B after a needle accidentally sticks his forearm.
episodes.title: My Sacrificial Clam

episodes.synopsis: Jordan's brother, Ben, is admitted at Sacred Heart when he has an accident with a nail gun.
episodes.title: My Occurrence

episodes.synopsis: In light of Ben's diagnosis, Dr. Cox is the unlikely voice of reason and compassion -- until his own fears get in the way.
episodes.title: My Hero

episodes.synopsis: It's J.D.'s last day as an intern. It's been quite a year for the three new doctors. But nevertheless, they have work to do.
episodes.title: My Last Day

episodes.synopsis: Jordan's revelations disrupt the relationships between the staff of Sacred Heart Hospital.
episodes.title: My Overkill

episodes.synopsis: J.D., Elliot, and Turk find themselves alone for the hospital night shift and face responsibilities without supervision for the first time.
episodes.title: My Nightingale

episodes.synopsis: J.D. refuses to play along with Dr. Kelso's condescending medical challenge, earning him the respect of Dr. Cox.
episodes.title: My Case Study

episodes.synopsis: J.D. gets Carla to open up to him and share a little bit more about herself, but he screws it up by telling Turk he thinks she's crazy.
episodes.title: My Big Mouth

episodes.synopsis: Elliot sleeps with a handsome doctor she hardly knows and soon becomes the hospital tramp -- a title she quickly capitalizes on.
episodes.title: My New Coat

episodes.synopsis: J.D.'s  fun and easygoing brother comes to town and quickly lays his charms on Elliot.
episodes.title: My Big Brother

episodes.synopsis: All the male doctors are euphoric when Julie Keaton, the pharmaceutical sales rep, visits -- except for Dr. Cox.
episodes.title: My First Step

episodes.synopsis: When an expectant Jordan shows up unexpectedly, Cox is forced to choose between her and his new love, Julie.
episodes.title: My Fruit Cups

episodes.synopsis: Elliot's been struggling ever since her father cut her off financially, and she now faces the threat of being sued by a patient.
episodes.title: My Lucky Day

episodes.synopsis: Elliot still doesn't have a place to live. She crashes at the hospital for one night, only to be fully reprehended by Dr. Kelso.
episodes.title: My Monster

episodes.synopsis: Now that J.D. and Elliot are temporarily living together, the sexual tension between the two heats up.
episodes.title: My Sex Buddy

episodes.synopsis: Comeuppances are in store for Cox, Kelso and J.D. from, respectively, a hypochondriac, a surgical patient, and Elliot.
episodes.title: My New Old Friend

episodes.synopsis: J.D. bonds with a patient who's waiting for a heart transplant and discusses with her their ideas of what death must be like.
episodes.title: My Philosophy

episodes.synopsis: Turk is still waiting on Carla to answer his proposal and asks his brother to stay over for a few days to help him deal with it.
episodes.title: My Brother, My Keeper

episodes.synopsis: Elliot meets a nice guy at the bar, but when she finds out he's a male nurse (a "murse"), she has doubts about getting involved with him.
episodes.title: His Story

episodes.synopsis: J.D. and Turk think they've got bad karma after hitting a car and causing an accident while playing golf on the hospital's roof.
episodes.title: My Karma

episodes.synopsis: A personal secret is revealed about Dr. Cox during hospital visitations by a cocky MD (guest star Jay Mohr), who establishes a rapport with J.D.
episodes.title: My Own Private Practice Guy

episodes.synopsis: J.D. flirts with the wife of a patient who's been in a coma for the past two years. He feels guilty, even though she welcomes his attention.
episodes.title: My T.C.W.

episodes.synopsis: Turk takes J.D. up to surgery, and right from the start, J.D. steps all over Turk when trying not to be the geek among the surgeons.
episodes.title: My Kingdom

episodes.synopsis: J.D. struggles to juggle work while dating a recently widowed woman. Cox baby-sits his son, and Turk is haunted by erotic dreams.
episodes.title: My Interpretation

episodes.synopsis: J.D. carries on his relationship with the Tasty Coma Widow but finds himself at a dead end after realizing there's no drama to fuel the romance.
episodes.title: My Drama Queen

episodes.synopsis: J.D. and Turk's college buddy, Spence, drops by for a visit and accidentally tells Dr. Cox that Jordan's baby is his.
episodes.title: My Dream Job

episodes.synopsis: A run-in with her old flame and an accident in her new car leads Elliot to the realization that nothing good has happened to her in years.
episodes.title: My Own American Girl

episodes.synopsis: J.D.'s feeling left out of his friendship with Turk and gets hurt when Turk brings The Todd to the bar where they were supposed to catch up.
episodes.title: My Journey

episodes.synopsis: Finding it difficult to train his interns, J.D. calls out to Elliot for some help.
episodes.title: My White Whale

episodes.synopsis: Sean is a bit surprised and disturbed to learn about Elliot and J.D.'s history together, but it turns out his anger is really a cover up.
episodes.title: My Lucky Night

episodes.synopsis: When Dan decides to stay with J.D. for a while after their mom's new fiancé kicks him out, he's surprised by his brother's newfound cynicism.
episodes.title: My Brother, Where Art Thou?

episodes.synopsis: A chance meeting in the elevator sparks a new friendship between J.D. and the mysterious Danni.
episodes.title: My Advice to You

episodes.synopsis: As J.D.'s relationship with Danni progresses, he and Dr. Cox are forced to spend more time together outside of the hospital.
episodes.title: My Fifteen Seconds

episodes.synopsis: Turk is delighted when he finally makes it through a solo surgery without the assistance of Carla.
episodes.title: My Friend the Doctor

episodes.synopsis: A repressed Elliot feels uncomfortable using clinical terms for her patient's private parts.
episodes.title: My Dirty Secret

episodes.synopsis: Carla and Elliot try to help a patient, Maggie, lose her virginity as she prepares to die.
episodes.title: My Rule of Thumb

episodes.synopsis: J.D. tries to break up with Danni, but she beats him to it when she realizes that she will always be second place to Elliot in his heart.
episodes.title: My Clean Break

episodes.synopsis: J.D. believes he may have finally found a mentor in Dr. Kevin Casey, a surgeon with obsessive-compulsive disorder.
episodes.title: My Catalyst

episodes.synopsis: Elliot finds herself perplexed over a simple procedure that leaves her questioning her career path.
episodes.title: My Porcelain God

episodes.synopsis: Jordan's brother and sister return, while Dr. Cox learns his brother-in-law Ben hasn't visited a doctor about his cancer in years.
episodes.title: My Screw Up

episodes.synopsis: Jordan's friends come to town to provide moral support for Jordan after her brother's death; however, they annoy Dr. Cox.
episodes.title: My Tormented Mentor

episodes.synopsis: Various what-ifs are explored as Turk looks for his lucky do-rag for surgery and Elliot tries to find a lost stuffed animal for a child patient.
episodes.title: My Butterfly

episodes.synopsis: J.D. must keep a secret when Carla's "what if" guy asks her out on a date.
episodes.title: My Moment of Un-Truth

episodes.synopsis: Turk accidentally cuts a patient's nerve, and the boy -- who happens to be a concert pianist -- loses the use of one of his hands.
episodes.title: His Story II

episodes.synopsis: J.D. hooks up with Danni again after Sean returns, but he can't forget about his passionate night with Elliot.
episodes.title: My Choosiest Choice of All

episodes.synopsis: Elliot asks Sean to move in with her, which only adds to J.D.'s problems. Turk is unsure why Dr. Miller's attitude toward him has changed.
episodes.title: My Fault

episodes.synopsis: J.D. is unsure what to do when he realizes he made a mistake by telling Elliot that he loves her.
episodes.title: My Self-Examination

episodes.synopsis: The big day for Turk and Carla has finally arrived, but a patient holds up Turk.
episodes.title: My Best Friend's Wedding

episodes.synopsis: Nothing is going to bring down J.D.'s last week of being a resident before he officially becomes a full-fledged doctor.
episodes.title: My Old Friend's New Friend

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Clock tries to reconcile J.D. and Elliot, while waiting to see which one Dr. Cox will name as chief resident.
episodes.title: My Office

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Cox has issues with Dr. Clock consulting his patients as well as the fact that he and Jordan are technically still married.
episodes.title: My New Game

episodes.synopsis: J.D. is shocked to hear Dr. Cox (who he has called in for a pep talk) tell his interns that, eventually, they will screw up and kill a patient.
episodes.title: My First Kill

episodes.synopsis: Elliot becomes unsure she wants Molly as her mentor when she finds out that Molly doesn't have a perfect home life.
episodes.title: Her Story

episodes.synopsis: When Dan resurfaces, J.D. is shocked to learn his father has passed away.
episodes.title: My Cake

episodes.synopsis: When J.D. finds Dan with Elliot, Turk tells him to use the "hurt brother" excuse to get them to break up.
episodes.title: My Common Enemy

episodes.synopsis: When Molly takes a job in another city, she and J.D. end up having a night of kissing -- and he tries to rush to sleep with her before she leaves.
episodes.title: My Last Chance

episodes.synopsis: J.D. is approached by a malpractice attorney, asking him to do a risky procedure on her father.
episodes.title: My Malpractical Decision

episodes.synopsis: With the case against Turk on his mind, J.D. attempts to end it with Neena, but she won't take no for an answer.
episodes.title: My Female Trouble

episodes.synopsis: J.D. takes matters into his own hands when searching for a relative of his favorite patient.
episodes.title: My Unicorn

episodes.synopsis: When J.D. must address a bunch of pre-med students about what it's like to be a doctor, he strays off the beaten path.
episodes.title: My Best Moment

episodes.synopsis: J.D. and Elliot are finally getting along as friends and work partners, but the balance is soon upset.
episodes.title: My Ocardial Infarction

episodes.synopsis: A man injured in a bar fight teaches Turk and J.D. a lesson about living life to the fullest.
episodes.title: My Lucky Charm

episodes.synopsis: J.D. has a crush on a girl that he met at a club and he's torn about telling her that her boyfriend has gonorrhea.
episodes.title: My Hypocritical Oath

episodes.synopsis: J.D. struggles to impress Kylie on their first date. During a hospital quarantine, Turk learns that Carla once dated Cox.
episodes.title: My Quarantine

episodes.synopsis: When J.D. meets a former writer from his favorite TV show "Cheers," J.D. begins to picture his life at the hospital as a multi-cam sitcom.
episodes.title: My Life in Four Cameras

episodes.synopsis: J.D. is thrown out of the apartment, and Turk and Carla continue to struggle to keep the romance alive.
episodes.title: My Roommates

episodes.synopsis: J.D. ditches a seemingly uninterested Kylie for Dr. Clock, who just returned from Milwaukee.
episodes.title: My Best Laid Plans

episodes.synopsis: Kelso dons scrubs to prove a point to Cox, only to watch it backfire when an obnoxious patient refuses to listen to him.
episodes.title: My Boss' Free Haircut

episodes.synopsis: When Carla and J.D. go out to let Carla have some fun, they get drunk and end up accidentally kissing.
episodes.title: My Lips Are Sealed

episodes.synopsis: J.D. and Carla get the silent treatment from Turk, who can't seem to control his emotions after learning about their kiss.
episodes.title: My Big Move

episodes.synopsis: Turk won't open up at couple's therapy, and Elliott refuses Cox's romantic advice when an attractive man saunters into the hospital.
episodes.title: My Faith in Humanity

episodes.synopsis: Elliot is torn between moving too quickly and ruining her new relationship with Jake. Dr. Cox teaches Turk about having a healthy ego.
episodes.title: My Drive-By

episodes.synopsis: With their residencies over, there are big changes at Sacred Heart. J.D. moves out to live on his own, while Turk and Carla consider a family change.
episodes.title: My Changing Ways

episodes.synopsis: Now an attending physician at Sacred Heart, J.D. has to deal with his own interns. Meanwhile, Turk has doubts about having children.
episodes.title: My Intern's Eyes

episodes.synopsis: J.D. wants to show Cox and Kelso how to treat interns, but instead finds out that they laugh at his bad jokes out of fear and respect.
episodes.title: My Rite of Passage

episodes.synopsis: While planning his birthday, J.D. finds a list of things he wanted to accomplish before he turned 30. He begins by entering a triathlon.
episodes.title: My Day at the Races

episodes.synopsis: J.D. is asked to introduce Dr. Kelso at an awards dinner, so he tries to find something good to say about him.
episodes.title: My Jiggly Ball

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Cox's religious sister, Paige, comes to visit for her nephew's baptism. Turk is finding out just how unsexy baby-making can be.
episodes.title: My New God

episodes.synopsis: J.D. mistakes an elderly woman's happiness as her wish to stop treatment for a fatal illness.
episodes.title: My Missed Perception

episodes.synopsis: In an homage to "The Wizard of Oz," J.D. is trying to go home, and Turk searches for a heart donor.
episodes.title: My Way Home

episodes.synopsis: J.D., Turk, Elliot and Carla are interrogated about the mysterious death of a patient.
episodes.title: My Big Bird

episodes.synopsis: J.D. meets klutzy Julie, and when he becomes smitten, Elliot attempts to help out with romance advice.
episodes.title: My Half-Acre

episodes.synopsis: J.D. is annoyed that Julie doesn't laugh, so Elliot encourages J.D. to tell her his feelings while Turk tries to use psychology to fix the issue.
episodes.title: Her Story II

episodes.synopsis: J.D. is still dealing with his recent break-up and trying not to kill intern Keith, who has become annoyingly perfect.
episodes.title: My Buddy's Booty

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Kelso is outraged when he discovers that a bird has been living in Sacred Heart. He orders the Janitor to dispose of it immediately.
episodes.title: My Cabbage

episodes.synopsis: J.D. and Dr. Cox go through the five stages of grief with their favorite patient, whose health is declining.
episodes.title: My Five Stages

episodes.synopsis: When Elliot's relationship with Keith is revealed, the other interns think he is getting special attention.
episodes.title: My Own Personal Hell

episodes.synopsis: J.D. urges Cox and his fellow doctors to do special, unconventional things for their patients.
episodes.title: My Extra Mile

episodes.synopsis: Turk finds out that Carla is pregnant before she does, so J.D. convinces Turk to tell the entire staff to surprise Carla with the news.
episodes.title: My Bright Idea

episodes.synopsis: When J.D. rearranges his schedule to allow himself more time to spend with Turk, Turk secretly resents it.
episodes.title: My Chopped Liver

episodes.synopsis: J.D.'s brother Dan returns for a surprise visit, and Elliot learns that J.D. has been telling Dan that she still likes him.
episodes.title: My New Suit

episodes.synopsis: Turk and Carla turn J.D.'s old bedroom into a nursery for the baby. The Janitor seizes an opportunity to shove J.D. out of the picture for a day.
episodes.title: His Story III

episodes.synopsis: J.D. asks Dr. Cox to go to lunch but runs into annoying former patient Jill Tracy, who unexpectedly teaches him something about responsibility.
episodes.title: My Lunch

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Cox starts drinking after his decisions result in the death of three of his patients.
episodes.title: My Fallen Idol

episodes.synopsis: J.D. starts feeling that the same things happen over and over again at the hospital.
episodes.title: My Déjà Vu, My Déjà Vu

episodes.synopsis: J.D. challenges a urologist's assessment on a consultation for a patient in need of a risky surgical procedure. He also starts to fall for her.
episodes.title: My Urologist

episodes.synopsis: J.D. plans a date with Dr. Kim Briggs on their night off, but Elliot gets in their way.
episodes.title: My Transition

episodes.synopsis: J.D. addresses the news that he's going to be a father.
episodes.title: My Mirror Image

episodes.synopsis: J.D. and Kim start contemplating their future and their baby's future.
episodes.title: My Best Friend's Baby's Baby and My Baby's Baby

episodes.synopsis: J.D. and Kim are surprised by how much they have in common. After giving birth, Carla doesn't want to return to work.
episodes.title: My Coffee

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Cox feels like the TV character House when he has to solve several mysteries, one of them being Elliot's anger towards Dr. Kelso, which for some reason she is taking out on Turk. J.D. tries to be a better boyfriend to Kim.
episodes.title: My House

episodes.synopsis: Elliot begins enjoying luxuries since she gets extra money from her new private practice gig. But eventually, J.D. becomes jealous of her and that prevents him from enjoying these privileges.
episodes.title: My Friend with Money

episodes.synopsis: A new patient at the hospital wakes up and sees everything happening around her as a musical. Carla can't decide whether to return to work, and Elliot must find a way to tell J.D. that he can't move into her new house with her.
episodes.title: My Musical

episodes.synopsis: The hospital is seen through the eyes of Dr. Kelso, who befriends an Iraq War veteran. The soldier's stay sparks a political debate among staff members.
episodes.title: His Story IV

episodes.synopsis: After being convinced to go to Tacoma for Kim's first ultrasound, J.D. -- along with Carla, Elliot, Janitor, Keith and Ted -- takes Kelso's new RV on a road trip.
episodes.title: My Road to Nowhere

episodes.synopsis: A Croatian doctor comes to Sacred Heart, only to find out that he has to redo his internship there. J.D. shows symptoms of vasovagal syncope, a condition that causes fainting and blackouts.
episodes.title: My Perspective

episodes.synopsis: J.D. develops a crush on a new physical therapist, but due to his latest misfortunes, he finds it difficult to ask her out.
episodes.title: My Therapeutic Month

episodes.synopsis: A memory-loss patient is the peg for a look back at the previous seasons of "Scrubs," when the Sacred Heart crew recalls their memorable moments.
episodes.title: My Night to Remember

episodes.synopsis: When Pvt. Dancer is released from the hospital, the military informs him that his injuries are too severe for him to be reinstated into the service. He gets depressed, so the Sacred Heart staff tries to cheer him up.
episodes.title: My Fishbowl

episodes.synopsis: J.D. and Turk try to treat Dr. Kelso's uninsured friend. Meanwhile, Dr. Kelso is concerned about a clothing thief.
episodes.title: My Scrubs

episodes.synopsis: Laverne and Dr. Cox engage in a philosophical debate. Carla finds a hot nanny for Isabella, and Turk struggles to find a way not to leer at her.
episodes.title: My No Good Reason

episodes.synopsis: Laverne is brain-dead, and her family decides to take her off life support. One by one, the staff members say their good-byes -- except Carla, who staunchly refuses to accept what's happening.
episodes.title: My Long Goodbye

episodes.synopsis: In the wake of Laverne's funeral, the Sacred Heart staff decides to apply lessons from her life to their actions.
episodes.title: My Words of Wisdom

episodes.synopsis: The perspective shifts between Jordan, Ted and Todd as they go about their day. Jordan messes with Elliot and Keith's relationship and is disturbed when it doesn't give her any satisfaction.
episodes.title: Their Story

episodes.synopsis: When Keith leaves town for a few days, J.D. expects that he'll finally be able to spend some quality time with Elliot. But he doesn't anticipate Elliot's old college friend dropping by.
episodes.title: My Turf War

episodes.synopsis: J.D. tries to get together with Elliot's sorority sister Melody, but she just wants to make out with him without going further.
episodes.title: My Cold Shower

episodes.synopsis: J.D. and Turk go to a medical convention in Phoenix, where they run into J.D.'s ex-girlfriend, Dr. Kim Briggs, who has a surprise for J.D.
episodes.title: My Conventional Wisdom

episodes.synopsis: Kim moves in with J.D. in order to raise their child together.
episodes.title: My Rabbit

episodes.synopsis: In the season finale, J.D. and Elliot start thinking about their future and if they made a mistake in not being with each other. The Janitor activates the "Brain Trust" to come up with the perfect wedding gift for Elliot.
episodes.title: My Point of No Return

episodes.synopsis: In the aftermath of their near-indiscretion, Elliot realizes that she doesn't want to be with Keith, and J.D. resolves to stop sabotaging himself.
episodes.title: My Own Worst Enemy

episodes.synopsis: Kim goes into labor, and J.D. struggles to decide if he should tell her what he really thinks of their relationship.
episodes.title: My Hard Labor

episodes.synopsis: J.D.'s brother Dan returns and delivers a few home truths to his little brother.
episodes.title: My Inconvenient Truth

episodes.synopsis: Turk tries to assure a worried Carla that their daughter will acknowledge her Latina heritage. The Janitor challenges J.D. to identify everyone in the hospital.
episodes.title: My Identity Crisis

episodes.synopsis: J.D. and Turk remember their first prank, Dr. Cox has a 10-year-old leukemia patient, and Dr. Kelso celebrates his birthday.
episodes.title: My Growing Pains

episodes.synopsis: Though Elliot boasts that she gets to get to know her patients at her private practice, nobody seems to care; Carla is amazed at how the Janitor was able to score such an attractive girlfriend.
episodes.title: My Number One Doctor

episodes.synopsis: J.D.'s teenage burn patient gives him a hard decision to make when he wants to go to his high school graduation.
episodes.title: My Bad Too

episodes.synopsis: When Dr. Kelso tells the Janitor that nobody cares what he thinks, the Janitor starts a newspaper called The Janitorial to prove him wrong. J.D. and Turk fight over their manhood issues.
episodes.title: My Manhood

episodes.synopsis: A patient that Dr. Cox hadn't been able to diagnose for two years returns to the hospital.
episodes.title: My Dumb Luck

episodes.synopsis: Elliot and J.D. discover a major change in their relationship when they spend time together looking for a former patient.
episodes.title: My Waste of Time

episodes.synopsis: After a hard day of work, Dr. Cox has the burden of telling his son, Jack, a bedtime story.
episodes.title: My Princess

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Kelso's beautiful replacement, the unethical Dr. Maddox, shakes things up a bit, while J.D. struggles to manage new interns. Courteney Cox guest stars.
episodes.title: My Jerks

episodes.synopsis: J.D. and Turk set aside their decade-long steak night tradition to comfort a dying patient, while Dr. Maddox begins to show her true colors.
episodes.title: My Last Words

episodes.synopsis: Desperate times call for desperate measures when lifelong adversaries Dr. Kelso and Dr. Cox join forces to oust Dr. Maddox from Sacred Heart.
episodes.title: My Saving Grace

episodes.synopsis: New sparks of an old romance are ignited between J.D. and Elliot when they work together to encourage Dr. Kelso to branch out beyond the hospital coffee shop.
episodes.title: My Happy Place

episodes.synopsis: J.D. learns the hard way that not even Elmo can teach the gift of compassion to those who don't care to learn (Sesame Workshop's Muppets guest star).
episodes.title: My ABC's

episodes.synopsis: Elliot and J.D. struggle to find the spark in their newfound romance, and Dr. Cox reluctantly considers accepting the job as the hospital's recently vacated chief of medicine.
episodes.title: My Cookie Pants

episodes.synopsis: When Dr. Cox becomes overwhelmed in his new role as chief of medicine, he does the unthinkable and reaches out to Dr. Kelso for friendship.
episodes.title: My New Role

episodes.synopsis: It takes a village to help Ted take the first step when he falls in love at first sight with a ukulele player.
episodes.title: My Lawyer's in Love

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Cox has a rare moment of conscience while J.D. takes a brief respite from work at the hospital. Meanwhile, Turk and Carla share some big news.
episodes.title: My Absence

episodes.synopsis: J.D. and Turk organize their historically unfunny annual sketch show with the new crop of interns.
episodes.title: My Comedy Show

episodes.synopsis: Turk gets an idea about a risky procedure from watching "SportsCenter" that may restore a paralyzed teenager's ability to walk.
episodes.title: My Nah Nah Nah

episodes.synopsis: The hospital interns provide the senior staff with surprising insight, and an extraordinary moment occurs when Dr. Cox shows J.D. some respect.
episodes.title: Their Story II

episodes.synopsis: A full moon and a healthy dose of bad luck bring Sacred Heart's new crop of interns their roughest case load yet, while Elliot has a revelation about her future.
episodes.title: My Full Moon

episodes.synopsis: When the Janitor and Lady send out invitations to their fake wedding in the Bahamas in order to score some loot, the joke's on them when everyone from Sacred Heart accepts.
episodes.title: My Soul on Fire: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Janitor and Lady's quirky tropical wedding ceremony affirms the romance of the strongest and oddest of Sacred Heart couples.
episodes.title: My Soul on Fire: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: As J.D. plans to move closer to Sam, he reaches out to make peace with Kim (guest star Elizabeth Banks) and finds that she has a new man.
episodes.title: My Cuz

episodes.synopsis: Change begets change when J.D. considers taking a new job so he can live closer to his son and Kim.
episodes.title: My Chief Concern

episodes.synopsis: J.D. plans to say goodbye to Sacred Heart, but will his final day stand up to his fantasy of scoring a hug from Dr. Cox or learning the Janitor's real name?
episodes.title: My Finale: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: J.D. plans to say goodbye to Sacred Heart, but will his final day stand up to his fantasy of scoring a hug from Dr. Cox or learning the Janitor's real name?
episodes.title: My Finale: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: J.D., Turk, Denise, Kelso and Dr. Cox teach med school at Sacred Heart, while med students Drew, Lucy, Maya and Cole attend their first day of school.
episodes.title: Our First Day of School

episodes.synopsis: Turk, J.D. and Dr. Kelso play matchmaker when they spot a potential love connection between Drew and Denise.
episodes.title: Our Drunk Friend

episodes.synopsis: J.D. and Drew learn a tough lesson in mentoring when Dr. Cox and Lucy show them that the student is sometimes the teacher.
episodes.title: Our Role Models

episodes.synopsis: While their wives are out of town, J.D. and Turk attend a med student's party; Dr. Kelso says goodbye to Ted and Gooch.
episodes.title: Our Histories

episodes.synopsis: J.D. seeks Dr. Cox's approval; Lucy tries to find the courage to perform a medical procedure; Drew and Denise make things official.
episodes.title: Our Mysteries

episodes.synopsis: Turk tries to find a replacement best friend; Elliot offers some advice to exhausted Lucy.
episodes.title: Our New Girl-Bro

episodes.synopsis: The med students must figure out why they want to be doctors; Elliot gives Denise relationship advice.
episodes.title: Our White Coats

episodes.synopsis: Lucy finds couplings throughout the hospital.
episodes.title: Our Couples

episodes.synopsis: The reality of having a baby settles in for Elliot and J.D.; Lucy struggles with the reality of operating on people.
episodes.title: Our Stuff Gets Real

episodes.synopsis: When a student cheats on an exam, Dr. Cox takes it out on the whole class; Denise makes a surprising admission.
episodes.title: Our True Lies

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Cox makes Lucy his "Hell Week" leader; Turk feels threatened when an internationally renowned surgeon visits.
episodes.title: Our Dear Leaders

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Kelso and Cole lean on each other for support when they find friends are hard to come by.
episodes.title: Our Driving Issues

episodes.synopsis: The med students are thankful when Cole identifies his true calling; Lucy finds her inspiration.
episodes.title: Our Thanks
